Do not use racist slurs and do not spam in chat.

group.headline: Steam's sneakiest group, the world's number one PC gaming magazine.
group.summary:
This is the buzzing, twitching nerve centre of our many-tendrilled games-playing monster.







In our chatroom, you'll be kicked or temporarily banned if you:

- Are a dick.
- Give away SPOILERZ!
- Actively promote piracy in any way (e.g. giving out names of sites, asking for links to be PM'ed)
-Complain excessively about things unrelated to and unfixable by PC Gamer. An example being TF2 updates.
-Ask for games to be gifted to you or engage in account trading
-Spam group or pm invites
-Link any undesirable content.

And perma-banned if you:

- Spam
- Link a site containing illegal torrents, downloads or other forms of piracy
- Do something we've previously kicked or temporarily banned you for
- Return with an alt account
- Use racist, sexist, homophobic or Xenophobic language.

Please note: None of the community moderators of the PCG Chat have administrator rights to the PCG TF2 Server or any PCG gameservers. If you wish to report cheaters, hackers, abuse etc then take a screenshot of the incident, get the SteamID of the offender, by typing status into the in-game developer console (enable in advanced keyboard options, open with the ` key to the left of the 1 key) and send an email to one of the PCG writers with the screenshot and SteamID so they can take action.

group.headline: Tactical Response Unit - Formerly known as TrU | kLaN
group.summary:
TrU Servers is one of the top gaming communities ever, dating back since 2002! TrU hosts a great number of servers for CS:1.6, CS:Source, and TF2 that are well runned by admins, as well as a great community that aids in making the gameplay experience memorable. Don't be afraid to join the forums and become part of the community. We welcome all old and new players to the new servers and hope to build a stronger community that will keep TrU running!

group.headline: Official Game Group
group.summary:
"THE DEEPEST MULTIPLAYER GAME OF THE YEAR"
Team Fortress® 2 (TF2) is the sequel to the game that put class-based, multiplayer team warfare on the map. Play as the flame-throwing Pyro, the room clearing Heavy, or the Spy, a master of disguises. Other classes include: Scout, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, Demoman, or Soldier.

group.headline: intox Gaming
group.summary:
Visit our forum @ www.intoxGaming.com

Welcome to intox Gaming! We are a multi-gaming community primarily focused on Counter-Strike: Source and Team Fortress 2.

You were invited into this group because you play CSS and/or TF2 and we think you will enjoy some of our servers!

Being invited into this group does not mean you are in the clan; wearing the 'intox' tag will result in a global ban from our servers. You must be invited into our PRIVATE group to become a full-fledged member. Become a well-known regular on our forum and servers and you just might receive an invite to the PRIVATE group. Good luck!

group.headline: VIP Reserved Slots...We're Makin' It Rain
group.summary:
Welcome to the fastest growing gaming community on the planet! We are not a clan, but a group of people who like to play ... and play to win. No Heroes is dedicated to building the most inclusive adult (18+) oriented gaming community on the planet. We do not allow any racism, bigotry, homophobic language, or sexual harassment of female players on our servers. Ever.

We have OVER TWENTY dedicated TF2 servers located all over the world on high-end, dual quad core dedicated servers. We also have Private Left 4 Dead 2 servers, Private L4D1 servers, and Ranked BFBC2 servers. More servers and more games in the near future, and this is only the beginning. Try the No Heroes experience for yourself... you won't be disappointed!

group.headline: L4D!
group.summary: Left 4 Dead is a co-op action horror game that casts up to four players in an epic struggle for survival against swarming zombie hordes and terrifying mutant monsters. Created by Valve, creators of Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, and Half-Life.

group.headline: TF2 in a nutshell
group.summary: Team Fortress® 2 (TF2) is the sequel to the game that put class-based, multiplayer team warfare on the map. Play as the flame-throwing Pyro, the room clearing Heavy, or the Spy, a master of disguises. Other classes include: Scout, Sniper, Medic, Engineer, Demoman, or Soldier.
A steam group to help organzie l4d and other game sessions.

- No swearing whatsoever.
- No inappropriate names.
- Follow staff requests.
- Do not flood.
- No advertising.
- Do not give abuse to anyone.
- Speak English.
- No webcam requests.
- No promotional drug talk.
- No spamming other chatters
- Most mIRC scripts are banned.

group.headline: L4D2
group.summary:
Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008.

This co-operative action horror FPS takes you and your friends through the cities, swamps and cemeteries of the Deep South, from Savannah to New Orleans across five expansive campaigns.

We would like to say a special thanks to the many people who contributed their time, energy, and expertise to make The Pacific Post Partum Support Society what it is today. The participation of a group of dedicated support and time.
No information given.

Team detour consists of some of the most extreemly talented, dedicated and diciplined players from all over Australia. Our members are not only great players. We are also very good friends and support each other any way we can. Though Team Detour has only been formed and funtioning for a few months, this does not reflect on the time and effort that has gone into producing the Team. It has taken me, ripppy, many years to find players that will listen to me and my rather abstract way of approaching the game. Once the players can fully appreciate my methods I am completly confident we will be unbeatable.

****TEAM DETOUR. are pround members of the POWERHOUSE multie platform global gameing organisation and will be representing POWERHOUSE as their Counter-Strike Source
Australia team.****

*****Team detour's scrim server is powered by the sick sounds of ****di.fm online radio**** and we suggest you check it out! Here is a link!*****

www.di.fm
free online music streamed to your pc for hardly any bandwidth

You can find our players on [AGC] Ranked 100tick Australian servers where places are payed real cash, or idleing mIRC channel #power|^|

All members are ecouraged to tag up as a detour. **name** as Team detour is a public team and represents gamers coming together.

group.headline: We want you!

Use the group chat, if you need help or want to write with other players.

Join this Community and tell your friends about it.

Feel free to use our tag: GlobalGaming |

# Comments with hyperlinks will be deleted by the admins of Global-Gaming!

group.headline: [WDZ]
group.summary:
Everyone is welcome! Tag up with [WDZ] in front of your name!


The Weekdayz Community is a large online community dedicated to gaming. As a community, we started off with Team Fortress 2, and we're starting expand out to other games. If you would like to join the massive WDZ army's quest to take over the gaming world, join and support us by wearing our tag [WDZ] to let people know that you're a part of the most kick-ass community ever.

group.headline: -"Wizbomb PTY LIMITED"- Full Profit Buisness Proudly maintaining POWERHOUSE Gaming -
group.summary:
Have you ever wanted to be a professional gamer? At POWERHOUSE
we strive to make gaming more accessible and fun for everyone by connecting teams and players from all over the globe and promoting equality and fairness. We are extremely busy working on new and exiting ways we can promote professional gaming and make it possible for anyone. We invite you to join with us in making worldwide professional gaming a reality instead of a possibility.



Teams that represent POWERHOUSE

(U.S) C.S 1.6 division, currently picking up for Cevo Summer Classic.

(U.S) C.S.S division, currently in ESEA-Main, and Cevo-Main

(Quebec LAN team since 2006) CoD4 division, currently in Cevo March Madness Tourney ; also Awaiting Cevo Premier Season 5.

(Australian) CSS division, who are currently rebuilding roster.

(Scandinavian) SC2 division, awaiting future seasons of gameplay.


POWERHOUSE is always accepting new divisions, volunteers and sponsors so please do not hesitate to stop in and show your support!

[ Sponsord by ]
#MaxFrag @ www.MaxFrag.net
#Theseries @ www.SelectiveSeries.com
#DexteriousMedia @ www.DexteriousMedia.com

If you have any questions, comments or concerns please feel free to message an admin/officer. YOUR WELCOME to stop by our mIRC channel at (irc.gamesurge.net) #power|^| - Thanks for being a part of POWERHOUSE GAMING!
